text: @Shehla_Rashid U dont have torch i agree coz u ppl use other house to burn n light up your house... N Modi Ji has said only fa the ppl who care fa themselves n others who are fighting fa us n nt ppl like u who are busy producing #CoronaVirus by ur community...🤣😂🤣😂
